briefTitle: Effect of MK0524A on Cholesterol Levels (0524A-048)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Demonstrate the Lipid-Altering Efficacy and Safety and Tolerability of MK0524A in Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia or Mixed Hyperlipidemia
summary: The primary objective of the study is to assess the effects of MK0524A in reducing cholesterol levels in an Asian population.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Low Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (LDL-C) After 12 Weeks
